entry.title: Post to list request
entry.summary: The sender of the message is Chris who is seeking access to post on the dev list. The purpose of his project, Meek hardware wallet, is to develop a solution that would prevent Man-in-the-Middle (MITM) attacks while transmitting pay-to information over a non-secure transport mechanism. The request for access to the dev list may be related to seeking feedback or collaboration from the developer community in order to improve the project.
